translation.en: Move it, move it, move, move, move!
Alpha, be advised, hostages on board. I repeat, hostages on board.
translation.ko: 알파, 인질이 타고 있다 반복한다, 차에 인질이 있다

translation.en: Do you copy? Use non-lethal force only, hostages on board.
translation.ko: 들었나? 살상 무기를 사용해선 안 된다 인질이 타고 있다
너흰 이제 안전해 102, 구출 준비 완료

translation.en: Amina, where do you come from?
Why did you put my bag on the ground?
I don't like the way you are taking gifts from this man.
translation.ko: 그 남자한테서 선물 같은 거 받지 마요

translation.en: I've told you already that he will not marry Amina.
translation.ko: 그 사람한테 아미나 시집보낼 생각 없다니까요

translation.en: I only see what is better for her.

translation.ko: 아카톡 여기 있던 염소 어디 갔어?

translation.en: The goat I tied here yesterday.
Mother, look, it's too early for that.
Ahba! Look at how we suffer on this compound.
translation.ko: 나 참, 우리 가족이 얼마나 고생하는지 봐라

translation.en: You are meant to be our savior.
Ahba! Don't you feel pity for us?
Everyone treats me like a leper in my father's house.
translation.ko: 모두 날 아버지 집의 문둥이로 취급하잖아요

translation.en: Who treats you like a leper more than yourself?
translation.ko: 누가 널 문둥이 취급해? 네가 널 문둥이 취급하는 거지

translation.en: And when day breaks, you do absolutely nothing
translation.ko: 날이 밝아도 손 하나 까딱 안 하잖아

translation.en: Someone should tell this useless man the truth.
translation.ko: 누가 이 쓸모없는 놈한테 진실을 말해줘야 할 거 아니냐

translation.en: You are very lucky today. I would've hit you.
translation.ko: 운 좋은 줄 아쇼 진짜 칠 뻔했으니까

translation.en: -It was fine. -Why are you following me?
Don't talk about that goat with me.
Rukaya. She wants to see you.
She's the woman getting jobs for our little ones in Burkina and beyond.
translation.ko: 이 아주머니는 애들한테 부르키나파소 같은 곳의 일자리를 구해주는 분이야

translation.en: But I told you I'm thinking about it.
Eh, what is there to think about?
Look at Amina. What can you give her in this town?
translation.ko: 아미나 좀 봐라 이 마을에서 뭘 해줄 수 있겠니?

translation.en: Rukaya, I promise you, if you don't listen to me, you are on your own.
translation.ko: 루카야, 내 말 안 들으면 우리 집에서 쫓겨날 줄 알아

translation.en: Don't worry, you will take Amina soon. Mm?
translation.ko: 걱정 마세요 곧 아미나를 데려가게 될 거예요

translation.en: You better think fast. You better think fast.
My sister, I will leave now.
Rukaya, do you think you are better than all the other mothers
translation.ko: 네가 다른 엄마들보다 뭐가 그리 잘났다고 버텨?

translation.en: who have sent their children away?

translation.ko: - 마녀 본 적 있어? - 라미시 아주머니요
들은 걸 다 믿으면 안 돼

translation.en: if you want to be fifth.
I had some time on my hands and I decided to pass by and say hello.
translation.ko: 시간이 좀 나서 인사나 하려고 들렸소

translation.en: [man] May God give us good health.
Amina. Get inside. Don't come out.
Rukaya. We were waiting for you. Have a seat.
Baba. You were my father's friend.
Yes. That's why I want to take care of your daughter.
translation.ko: 그래, 그래서 네 딸을 돌봐주려는 거 아니냐?

translation.en: Aren't you ashamed of yourself? Going after your friend's granddaughter?
translation.ko: 부끄럽지도 않으세요? 어떻게 친구 손녀를 넘봐요?

translation.en: Is it because we are poor?
If you had listened to me,
Alhaji Dauda would've been your husband by now.
And went after that useless boy
translation.ko: 별 볼 일 없는 애나 쫓아다니다가

translation.en: Do you want Amina to end up like you?
Mama. I want better for her.
translation.ko: 어머니, 전 아미나가 더 잘됐으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Oh. She says I should leave?
So you think sending her to some strange land will solve our problems.
translation.ko: 듣도 보도 못한 외지로 그 애를 보내면 문제가 해결돼?

translation.en: Mama. Any option is better than becoming a fourth wife.
translation.ko: 어머니, 뭘 하든지 간에 넷째 아내가 되는 것보단 나아요

translation.en: Since when did my opinion matter in this house?
translation.ko: 언제부터 이 집에서 내 의견이 중요했다고요?

translation.en: Is that all you can say?
I have to get to the market.
Your mother loves you. She will never allow any harm to come to you.
translation.ko: 네 엄마는 널 사랑해 너한테 해될 일은 절대 안 할 거다

translation.en: You are a child no more.
Talk to your mother before you go. Do you hear?
We have to pick up the last person quickly.
So by dawn we should've left.
What you said is right. Now we have gathered them.
translation.ko: 아주머니 말이 맞아요 - 이제 애들을 다 모았으니 - 그래

translation.en: So what we're supposed to do now is...
What are you doing here? Huh?
Do you know why you are here?
translation.ko: 여기 왜 온 건지 알기나 해?

translation.en: Huh? What are you doing here?
Listen, you are going to be sold.
And you won't come back again. Huh?
Calm down. I must find a way... to get you out of here.
translation.ko: 일단 진정해 널 여기서 빼낼 방법을 찾을게

translation.en: Madam, this girl, she is very stubborn and disobedient.
translation.ko: 부인, 얘가 쇠고집이라 말을 안 도통 안 듣네요

translation.en: Calm down, OK? Hmm? You will be fine.
translation.ko: 안심해, 알았지? 아무 일도 없을 거야

translation.en: You'll be fine, OK? You'll be fine.
Don't mind him, OK? Stop crying, OK?
translation.ko: 저 남자는 신경 쓰지 마 그만 울어, 응?

translation.en: Is everyone done with the work?
Hmm... Everyone is done, except Yussif.
We can't have the kids agitated now.
translation.ko: 지금 애들을 불안하게 하면 안 돼

translation.en: [woman] This is going to be your temporary home until we can send each of you home.
translation.ko: 너희가 임시로 살 집이야 각자 원래 집으로 돌려보내질 때까지

translation.en: [boy] How do we get food to eat?
They loaded the harvest this afternoon.
I've gone there two times today so this is our last chance
translation.ko: 오늘 두 번 가봤어 이게 우리 마지막 기회야

translation.en: If we miss it again, we have to wait for the next harvest.
translation.ko: 이 기회 놓치면 다음 수확까지 기다려야 해

translation.en: You are always sad. My name is Seidu.
translation.ko: 넌 늘 슬픈 것 같더라 난 세이두야

translation.en: My home... I couldn't remember it.
-Do you remember your parents? -I don't want to.
translation.ko: - 부모님은 기억해? - 기억 못 했으면 좋겠어

translation.en: They gave me to people for money!
Hey! Fuseini. Start the vehicle, I'm in a hurry.
I'II be away for five days. So take care of the farm.
translation.ko: 닷새 뒤에 돌아올 테니 나 없을 동안 농장 잘 돌봐

translation.en: Why haven't you started the car yet?
-You've got it now? -Just like I want it.
translation.ko: - 이제 됐어요? - 딱 내가 원하는 거야

translation.en: Fuseini. I suspect there are people in the truck. Open it and let's see.
translation.ko: 푸세이니 트럭에 불청객이 탄 것 같다 열어서 확인해보자

translation.en: There are people in the truck. Open it properly.
What are you doing in the truck? I said what are you doing in the truck!
translation.ko: 내 트럭에서 뭐 해? - 뭐 하고 있었어? - 아저씨, 설명해드릴게요

translation.en: Baba, we're sorry, we only needed to escape and you know how long
some of us have been there and we've no money.
translation.ko: 얼마나 오래 있었는지 아시잖아요, 돈도 없고요

translation.en: Look here, Fuseini. Start the truck and let's return.
translation.ko: 이것 봐, 푸세이니 시동 걸어, 돌아가야겠다

translation.en: [both] Baba, please, we can't go back.
translation.ko: - 아저씨, 그러지 마세요 - 제발 돌려보내지 마세요

translation.en: What do I get out of this?
translation.ko: 너희를 태워주고 내가 얻는 게 뭐야?

translation.en: Baba, we help you sell faster. In exchange for the transport money.
translation.ko: 작물 빨리 파시게 도와드릴게요 교통비 대신으로요

translation.en: It's OK. Because of the offer.
Let me give you this one.
-Thank you, Baba. -I should be thanking you people.
Do you want to cause problems for me? Ah.
No. I said we were running away.
translation.ko: 거짓말 안 했어 도망갈 거라고 했잖아

translation.en: Your mother doesn't want you home without money. So follow us to Accra.
translation.ko: 네가 빈손으로 오는 건 네 엄마도 원치 않으실걸 아크라로 가자
이 돈 좀 봐, 많이 벌었잖아

translation.en: So how much is my share?
So why does your grandmother want you to marry the old man?
translation.ko: 너희 할머니는 왜 널 노인이랑 결혼시키려 해?

translation.en: So, it's good you didn't go.
My mother can protect me. I just want her to know I'm OK.
translation.ko: 엄마가 날 지켜줄 거야 내가 무사한 거 알려줘야 하는데

translation.en: As we're in Accra now, you'll be fine.
Wow! Look at the big gate.
translation.ko: 저 문 좀 봐, 무진장 커

translation.en: -Wow, this place is nice. -Oh, look at the flowers.
translation.ko: - 여기 진짜 멋지다 - 저기 봐봐, 꽃도 예뻐

translation.en: Wow, they're nice. Look at the beautiful building.
translation.ko: 저것도 멋져 저 빌딩 진짜 근사하다
저것 좀 봐 막 혼자 걸어가는데

translation.en: We'll get off at the last stop.
I was as young as you when I came to the city.
translation.ko: 나도 딱 너만 할 때 이 도시에 왔지

translation.en: Things are difficult for people who come here for the first time.
translation.ko: 처음 온 사람한테 여긴 만만한 곳이 아니야

translation.en: But later, it will be OK.
Have you seen what you've done?
You are a hard woker. I will introduce you to my boss.
translation.ko: 너 일 열심히 한다 우리 보스한테 소개해줄게

translation.en: When you finish work, we can go to my boss.
translation.ko: 그럼 일 끝내고 우리 보스한테 가자

translation.en: I like the way you work. I will take you to him, OK?
translation.ko: 일하는 게 맘에 들어 내가 보스한테 데려가 줄게

translation.en: We must find my Amina, we must find her.
You have to go to Accra.
Me? Why me? I won't go.
translation.ko: 내가? 왜 나야? 난 안 가

translation.en: And take care of Mama. I will go.
translation.ko: 내가 갈 테니 네가 어머니 모셔

translation.en: I'm going to look for Amina.
What could she be doing now?
Have it, that's all I have, OK.
-It's not enough. -I'll top it up next week.
translation.ko: - 이거론 모자라요 - 다음 주에 더 줄게요

translation.en: -I'll be on my way. -OK, thank you.

translation.ko: 신께서 허락하시면 다음 주에 또 봅시다

translation.en: Stop what you're doing and give us the money.
[woman] Is that the way to take money from someone?
translation.ko: 이런 식으로 돈 뜯으면 안 되지

translation.en: I've been looking for you everywhere.
OK, ask for the boss's place in the yam market.
translation.ko: 그래, 얌 시장에서 보스 집이 어디냐고 물어봐

translation.en: Hey, head porter. Ah! Let's go, what are you doing there?
translation.ko: 얘, 짐꾼, 빨리 와, 거기서 뭐 해?

translation.en: I don't care, give us the money.
You told me to come so you'll help me.
Busy doing what, smoking and drinking?
translation.ko: 뭐 하느라 바빠? 술 마시고 담배 피우느라?

translation.en: I need to fit in, or else they'll throw me out.
-What do you want? -You said you'd help me.
translation.ko: - 왜 온 거야? - 나 도와줄 거랬잖아

translation.en: Have you started looking for her?
You don't know what people are going through in this city.
translation.ko: 이 도시엔 별의별 인간이 다 있어

translation.en: But I have to survive first.
translation.ko: 일단 나부터 살아야 할 거 아니야

translation.en: So... What work do you do now?
translation.ko: 그래서, 넌 요즘 무슨 일 해?

translation.en: I live there with my daughter, Esther.

translation.ko: 나 일자리 좀 줄 수 있어?
- 다녀왔어요 - 잘 왔어, 학교에선 별일 없었고?

translation.en: Go inside and change and come back.
You know what? Go and wash the things.
I'm sorry for the other day.
OK, but you have to be careful, don't forget why you're here.
translation.ko: 알았어, 하지만 조심해 왜 여기 왔는지 잊지 마

translation.en: Yes, madam! My small girl is now my madam.
translation.ko: 네, 마님 작은 여자애가 마님이 다 됐네

translation.en: Ooh... Really? It's like that, huh?
Amina, listen, I want you to be my friend.
translation.ko: 아미나, 들어봐 네 친구가 되고 싶어

translation.en: Look, I want you to be my girlfriend. I like you.
translation.ko: 널 좋아해 내 여자 친구가 돼줘

translation.en: One hundred cedis just to sleep with me. How about that?
Where is your money? This is the second time this week.
translation.ko: 집세는 어디 있어? 이번 주에 벌써 두 번째야

translation.en: You want me to kick you out to the street?
Madam, please, tomorrow I'll bring double.
translation.ko: 한 번만 봐주세요 내일 두 배로 드릴게요

translation.en: You will bring double? It doesn't apply to you alone.
translation.ko: 두 배로 주겠다고? 너만 그런 것도 아니야

translation.en: You and this girl have not paid anything today.
translation.ko: 너랑 얘 둘 다 오늘 한 푼도 안 냈어

translation.en: If you don't bring double by the end of tomorrow,
translation.ko: 내일 저녁까지 두 배로 안 가져오면

translation.en: you will sleep on the street. Foolish girls.
translation.ko: 거리에 나앉을 줄 알아 멍청한 계집애들 같으니

translation.en: My dear, where is your money?
What is this? Ah. What's wrong with you? Are you crazy?
translation.ko: 이게 뭐야? 뭐 하자는 거야, 너 미쳤어?

translation.en: As from today, the money you will bring each day is 15 cedis.
I will deal with you. It won't be easy if you fail to give me money next time.
translation.ko: 혼날 줄 알아 또 돈 안 내면 가만 안 놔둬

translation.en: You give money today and fail to give tomorrow.
translation.ko: 오늘은 주고 내일은 안 주고 그러면 안 되지

translation.en: This is the kind of lady I like, consistent with her payment.
translation.ko: 난 이런 애가 좋더라 집세를 꼬박꼬박 내잖아

translation.en: That's why I like you. You pay your money.
translation.ko: 이래서 자기가 좋다니까 낼 돈을 꼬박꼬박 내잖아

translation.en: You are unlike these other girls. They're not regular in payment.
translation.ko: 딴 애들은 너랑 다르게 허구한 날 집세를 빼먹거든

translation.en: Tomorrow I will see you, yeah? See you tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 또 올게, 고마워, 내일 봐

translation.en: Look at all this money. And the others are failing to pay.
translation.ko: 이 돈 좀 봐 못 내는 애들도 많은데

translation.en: OK? You are a woman now.
In this place, it's normal the way people treat you.
translation.ko: 원래 이런 곳에선 여자를 그렇게 대하는 놈이 많아

translation.en: From today, me and you, we will make good money.
translation.ko: 오늘부터 너 나랑 제대로 한몫 벌어보자

translation.en: You know you are a beautiful girl.
Watch your face. Tell me something. Smile. Hm?
translation.ko: 네 얼굴 좀 봐 나 보고 한번 웃어볼래?

translation.en: I will give them to you for six cedis each
-[woman] What type of yams are these? -It's white yam.
OK, how much is it for everything?
You bring what you have and take these away.
Carry the yams and let's go.
Serve her, Seidu! Take care of everything.
[Amina] Please, it's me, I'm looking for Seidu.
Sorry. I thought Seidu was here.
translation.ko: 죄송해요 세이두가 여기 있는 줄 알았어요

translation.en: Don't go. Seidu will be here soon.
translation.ko: 가지 마, 세이두 곧 올 거야

translation.en: Why are you looking for Seidu?
I came to tell him that I'm going to my hometown.
I will take care of you.
Wait, let me see if the boss is in there.
Next time you do that, we will kill you.
[his mother] You do absolutely nothing except sleeping
translation.ko: 날이 밝아도 손 하나 까딱 안 하잖아
- 너무 오래 걸리네 - 왜 이렇게 안 나와? "3개월 후"

translation.en: Don't they know there are people waiting to bathe.
translation.ko: 씻으려고 기다리는 사람 있는 거 모르나?

translation.en: What is it? Who's in there?
translation.ko: 왜 그래? - 안에 누구야? - 한참 기다렸어요

translation.en: Hurry up and get out, your time is up. Madam.
You are pregnant! In this house?
How am I going to get my money?
With your pregnancy, you expect me to feed you?
How am I going to get my money every evening?
translation.ko: 매일 저녁 집세는 어떻게 낼 거야?

translation.en: You have to abort that bastard.
No babies in this house, that's the rule.
translation.ko: 이 집에선 아기 못 낳아 그게 규칙이야

translation.en: Go and abort it before I throw you out.
translation.ko: 가서 떼고 와 길거리로 쫓아내기 전에

translation.en: Young girls of your age come here all the time.
translation.ko: 네 나이대 애들 엄청 많이 와

translation.en: The most complicated ones can be aborted easily.
translation.ko: 아주 복잡한 경우도 쉽게 떼버릴 수 있어

translation.en: You won't listen to my advice and you won't comply.
translation.ko: 내 조언도 무시하고 규칙도 어기고 있잖아

translation.en: The day you don't bring money again,
that day, I will send you out packing.
Do you hear what I'm saying? Foolish girl.
I now have to go home with bad news.
translation.ko: 이제 안 좋은 소식을 들고 집에 돌아가야겠어

translation.en: Take the books outside and continue with your homework.
translation.ko: 책 가지고 나가서 숙제 마저 해

translation.en: my husband threw me and Esther out.
After seeing Esther off to school,
I sat on the front porch.
When I turned, it was Esther.
It felt like everything will be alright.
translation.ko: 그러자 모든 게 괜찮아질 것 같았어

translation.en: I see you have gone through a lot.

translation.ko: 넌 걔를 찾을 거야 꼭 찾을 거야

translation.en: Sister, please, I'm looking for this girl.
translation.ko: 아주머니, 잠깐만요 이 여자애를 찾고 있는데요

translation.en: Have you seen this girl anywhere?
I'm looking for this girl, her name is Amina.
translation.ko: 이 여자애를 찾고 있어요 이름은 아미나예요

translation.en: -Who? -Her name is Amina, I am looking for her.
She is here? She has come here?
translation.ko: 여기 있다고요? 여기 온 적 있어요?

translation.en: -We're looking for her. -Is she a relative?
Yeah, we were told she is here.
-Have you been to Kokomba? -Tomorrow we will go there.
-Have you been to Tema Station? -We are just coming from there.
As long as I live under Adiza's roof, I will never go home.
translation.ko: 아디자 집에 사는 한 고향에 절대 못 돌아가요

translation.en: Please, Sister Ama asked me to deliver these.
translation.ko: 좀 도와주실래요? 아마 아주머니가 배달하라고 하신 거예요

translation.en: -Did you find anything? -No one seems to know her.
translation.ko: - 뭐 좀 찾았어? - 아무도 모르는 것 같아

translation.en: -Have you got everything? -No, I need to get one more thing.
translation.ko: - 살 거 다 샀어? - 아니, 하나 더 사야 해

translation.en: Please help her carry the things.
Idiot, kill him, he's not dead!
He's not dead yet, kill him.
Animal, kill him, he's not dead...
translation.ko: 짐승 새끼! 죽이라니까, 아직 안 죽었어!

translation.en: Fool, he's still alive, kill him!
translation.ko: 멍청한 놈, 아직 살아 있네, 죽여!
- 어머니, 안녕하세요 - 어서 오너라, 우리 아들
